title: Apologies & Suspensions
description:
Tony Kornheiser and Michael Wilbon discuss their thoughts on Kyrie Irving’s suspension and apology, what their biggest highlight from Game 5 of the World Series was and if they are more or less impressed with the Eagles after their win over the Texans on Thursday Night Football.
